mapper.select:
select apply.apply_id, apply.medical_id, apply.item_name, apply.fee, apply.status, apply.create_time, apply.type, mr.name, mr.id_card
FROM (SELECT ac.apply_check_id apply_id, ac.medical_id, ac.check_name item_name, ac.fee, ac.status, ac.create_time, '1' TYPE FROM t_apply_checking ac UNION ALL SELECT ai.apply_inspect_id apply_id, ai.medical_id, ai.inspect_name item_name, ai.fee, ai.status, ai.create_time, '2' TYPE FROM t_apply_inspect ai) apply INNER JOIN t_medical_record mr ON apply.medical_id = mr.medical_id
and mr.medical_id = #{medicalId}
and mr.name like '%${name}%'
and mr.id_card like '%${idCard}%'
ORDER BY apply.create_time DESC
